main event: An unidentified object was sighted in Bakersfield, California in November 1957.
interesting points: The object was described as cigar-shaped with white, red, and green alternating lights., The size of the object was estimated to be that of a basketball., The observation lasted for one hour and was visual from the ground., The object was noted to be orbiting during the sighting., The observers were initially looking for Sputnik when they spotted the object.
sighted object: cigar-shaped object with alternating white, red, and green lights
